Description: Himalaya's Baby Powder helps to eliminate dryness while keeping baby's skin cool and comfortable. Enriched with the cooling extracts of Khus-Khus that refreshes the skin and Yashada Bhasma, which keeps the skin dry and smooth. Prevents body odour. Stops excessive sweating.

Title: Himalaya Prickly Heat Baby Powder 200 gm - Pack of 4(200 g)
Description: Himalaya's Prickly Heat Baby Powder provides relief from prickly heat and protects skin from infections. The ingredients work together to keep your baby's skin cool. Key ingredients: Neem has antimicrobial, anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, which protect baby's skin from infections, rashes and inflammation. Khus Grass has antiperspirant and astringent properties, which keep baby's skin fresh all day. Natural Zinc contains antiseptic properties and has traditionally been used as a wound healing agent. Pack size: 200 g. Directions for use: Sprinkle Prickly Heat Baby Powder liberally on baby's skin after bathing, nappy change, and before bedtime.

Title: Gatsby Water Gloss Super Hard Hair Styler
Description: Trying different hairstyles explores your creativity. You can try your own style, when Gatsby comes with Water Gloss Super Hard Hair Styler. The hair water gloss series will help you style the way you want which can assure the spotlight on you. The Gatsby Water Gloss Super Hard Hair Styler is beautifully designed for men and women. For a wet hair do you can use this Super Hard Hair Styler. You don’t have to worry if this styler suits your hair, as it suits all. The water-type pomade will help you wash off the gel after you get back from a fun party. The non-sticky hair styling gel will nourish your hair and give it that perfect wet look. This Water Gloss Super Hard Hair Styler will hold your hair in place and assure the spotlight on you at your friend’s party. Directions for Use After a shower take an adequate amounts of this Hair Styler onto your palm. Apply evenly on your hair and style it.
CategoryName: Health and Beauty>Hair Care>Hair Styling

Title: Toni & Guy Firm It Hair Glue Hair Styler
Description: Toni&Guy introduces yet another high quality product to its range of hair creams with the Toni&Guy Firm It Hair Glue Hair Styler. Suitable for both men and women, this hair care product is ideal for all types of hair and all kinds of occasions. With the conditioning agent Dimethicone Copolyol, this hair cream gives you a firm and strong hold throughout the day along with glossy effect. The cream helps to soften cuticles and creates an invisible mist all over your hair to hold your strands effectively together. Get that perfect slick look and improve the texture of your tresses by applying this hair cream. Work out a sassy casual hairdo or a classy formal style with this product and be sure to get some stares. Directions for use: -Apply a moderate amount on your hair evenly. -Gently massage for proper absorption and let it dry naturally. -Style according to need.

This Material Also Makes These Combs Hypoallergenic Which Means They Are Skin Friendly And Will Not Cause Any Form Of Allergy On Any Skin Type. Moreover, The Combs Are Seamless, Which Means They Have Smoothened And Rounded Tips That Massage The Scalp And Stimulate The Natural Oils And Smoothened Teeth Edges To Prevent Scraping Of The Hair Cuticles And Scalp While Styling Dry/Wet Hair. Watch The Hair Behave And Stay In Place As You Witness A Comfortable And Irritation-Free Hair Combing Experience, With Every Stroke.Ordinary Combs have sharp edges that damage the cuticle, roughen the scales and cause unhealthy split hair. In fact, such combs actually undo treatments of even the best shampoos!Roots Combs have rounded teeth that massage the scalp and stimulate natural oils in the hair cuticle. This keeps scales smooth, so hair stays strong and healthy.Always and only use a Roots comb and hair brush. Then watch your hair bounce back to life.Features:Cellulose Acetate MaterialSeamlessLow-StaticSmoothened Tips and EdgesGlossy Finish

The Combs Are Seamless, Which Means They Have Smoothened And Rounded Tips That Massage The Scalp And Stimulate The Natural Oils And Smoothened Teeth Edges To Prevent Scraping Of The Hair Cuticles And Scalp While Combing. Moreover, They Are Completely Anti-Static, Which Makes Them Your Perfect Hair Grooming Tool For Winters. No More Winter Frizz Or Flyaways! Watch Your Hair Behave And Stay In Place As You Witness A Comfortable And Irritation-Free Hair Combing Experience, Everyday. Strictly For Dry Use. Do Not Use On Wet Hair. Available In 8 Different Types.Ordinary Combs have sharp edges that damage the cuticle, roughen the scales and cause unhealthy split hair. In fact, such combs actually undo treatments of even the best shampoos!Roots Combs have rounded teeth that massage the scalp and stimulate natural oils in the hair cuticle. This keeps scales smooth, so hair stays strong and healthy.Always and only use a Roots comb and hair brush. Then watch your hair bounce back to life.Features:100% Wood - No Polish or VarnishAnti-StaticSeamlessSmoothened Tips and EdgesSmooth Finish

Title: Pantene Hairfall Control Shampoo(340 ml)
Description: If you are fed up of spending hours on your unmanageable hair, then here is a quick fix solution, Pantene comes with Hairfall Control Shampoo to help you attain healthy hair that is beautiful, as well as easy to maintain. For all those men and women longing for that lustrous hair, this Hairfall Control Shampoo could be your apt choice. The Pantene Hairfall Control Shampoo is enriched with active ingredients to keep your hair silky smooth and protect it from pollution. Also, this Shampoo will remove excess amount of oil from your hair. Besides reducing your hair fall, this Pantene  Shampoo will nourish your hair. In addition to this, your hair will have the perfect amount of moisture as this Shampoo provides i with unique essentials. You can bid farewell to all the impurities from you hair and scalp, as this Hairfall Control Shampoo cleanses it perfectly. You need not worry about hair breakage, as this Shampoo protects it from breakage and keeps your hair free from tangle. You could now get that beautiful shiny hair with this Pantene Shampoo. Directions for Use Take an adequate amount of this shampoo onto your palm. Massage gently on wet hair and work up a lather. Rinse off.
CategoryName: Health and Beauty>Hair Care>Shampoos

Title: Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo
Description: If the comb you pass through your hair every morning brings out more than a few strands, the main concern is weak hair. Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo addresses the main cause of hair fall. Rough or weak hair leads to hair breakage and finally hair fall. Incorporating the opinion of Sunsilk hair experts, Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo nourishes brittle hair from root to tip to prevent breakage and hair fall. Suitable for use by anyone suffering from excess hair fall, Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo can be used on all types. The Hair Fall Solution Shampoo is formulated with natural Soya Vitamin Complex that deeply nourishes your hair. Your hair feels strong and hair fall is reduced considerably. Turn heads at college with your naturally thick tresses that stand the stress of exam or climate change with Sunsilk Hair Fall Solution Shampoo. Directions for Use Apply the Hair Fall Solution Shampoo to wet hair gently massage using your fingertips. Rinse off thoroughly.
CategoryName: Health and Beauty>Hair Care>Shampoos

Title: Femilite Hygienic Anti-Bacterial Intimate Wash(100 ml, Pack of 1)
Description: Femilite contains ingredients like Sea Buckthorn Extract, which is a great natural cleanser. This Extract is rich in vitamin A, C and E, nutrients like carotenoids, etc. and it also has antioxidant properties. It also contains Tea Tree oil which helps treat vaginal infections by killing bacteria and fungus and reducing allergic skin reactions. Daily washing with Femilite leaves a fresh feeling and helps maintain healthy vaginal flora, prevent unpleasant odour and irritations of the intimate areas. Chamomile Extract has anti-bacterial, anti-inflammatory, anti-fungal and anti-allergic properties and is used topically to treat inflammation of the skin and skin diseases. Lactic Acid exfoliates the skin.
